forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
The morning sun bathed downtown San Francisco in a gentle embrace, casting a soft glow that hints at serenity. As the day unfolds, expect ample sunshine alongside a high near sixty-three, though breezy whispers from the southwest remind all to layer thoughtfully. The wind, shifting about like a playful spirit, could gust to eighteen miles per hour, mingling warmth with a touch of coolness. As you venture out, consider donning a light sweater or a cardigan, for as the afternoon unfolds, the temperatures will gradually ease down to around sixty, enveloping the city in a comfortable caress.

Looking ahead to tonight, the clouds will gather softly, cloaking the city in a cozy shroud with lows hovering around fifty-two. A pleasant evening stroll by the waterfront beckons, where the hustle and bustle of the day gradually gives way to the tranquility of twilight. The fading light—filtered by clouds—will cradle the city, transforming it into a picturesque canvas for evening reflections. For a simple yet delightful end to your day, perhaps find a quiet spot with a view of the Bay, where the shifting hues of sunset weave a tapestry of calm, perfectly in tune with the style of this almost mystical San Francisco day.
